author: CBC News
title: Explosions over Kyiv as Ukraine faces Russian advance | CBC News
description: Missiles pounded the Ukrainian capital on Friday as Russian forces pressed their advance and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky pleaded with the international community to do more, saying sanctions announced so far were not enough.
content:
